item.title: OpenAI Rolls Out Teen Safety Features Amid Growing Scrutiny
item.description: CEO Sam Altman announced an age-prediction system and new parental controls in a blog post on Tuesday.

item.title: OpenAI's Teen Safety Features Will Walk a Thin Line
item.description: CEO Sam Altman announced an age-prediction system and new parental controls in a blog post on Tuesday.

item.title: Teachers Are Trying to Make AI Work for Them
item.description: Since the start of the AI boom, teachers have been tasked with figuring out if LLMs are helpful tools or a cheat code. This is how they’re bringing AI to their curricula.

item.title: Teachers Are Trying to Make AI Work for Them
item.description: Since the start of the AI boom, teachers have been tasked with figuring out if LLMs are helpful tools or a cheat code. This is how they’re bringing AI to their curricula.

item.title: The Tweens Down Under: Life Without Social Media in Australia
item.description: As Australia rolls out a ban on social media for kids under 16, tech companies face steep fines and teens face life without TikTok, Instagram, and other platforms. Will it work?

item.title: The Tweens Down Under: Life Without Social Media in Australia
item.description: As Australia rolls out a ban on social media for kids under 16, tech companies face steep fines and teens face life without TikTok, Instagram, and other platforms. Will it work?

item.title: How Social Media Is Fueling Gen Z’s Sex Recession
item.description: For her new book, journalist Carter Sherman interviewed over 100 young people about why they’re not having sex. She says they’re “very horny” but also more isolated, self-conscious, and fearful.
